{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=BEFSR41W |revision= |upc=745883552139 |ean= |asin=B00005TSUX |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Brecis |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:06:25 |oui_eth=00:06:25 |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|EtherFast Cable/DSL Wireless-Ready Router with 4-Port Switch}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=BEFSR41W}} This model was also (presumably) [http://ricochet.wikispaces.com/Linksys+Ricochet+Router sold as the BEFSR41W-RN], which, instead of a '''Intersil''' card, used a Merlin Ricochet modem card (and perhaps had some additional hardware differences).
